/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the city's organized chaos. A large, modern building with a curved roof stands prominently in the center of the frame, its unique architecture a testament to the city's architectural prowess. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
